title: My Big Sister Can See Dragons
description: Gaby, Marty’s big sister, can do anything and everything better than Marty. And she even has a “dragon eye” — Gaby can see dragons! There were big, small, blue, orange, pink, and polka-dotted dragons. “Can you teach me?” Marty asked her sister one day, to see dragons, she meant. And so Gaby would show her little sister how…Recommended for ages 4-12
author: Rocky Sanchez Tirona
